sentence.Network_en: He hastened to assure me that there was nothing traumatic to report.
sentence.Network_cn: 他急忙向我保证没有什么不快的事情要说。

sentence.Network_en: For a child the death of a pet can be traumatic.
sentence.Network_cn: 对孩子来说，一只宠物的死亡可能会造成心理创伤。

sentence.Network_en: I suffered a nervous breakdown. It was a traumatic experience.
sentence.Network_cn: 我曾经神经崩溃过。那是一次痛苦的经历。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: via late Latin from Greek traumatikos, from trauma (see trauma)

entry.tran: 造成创伤的;惊骇的;痛苦的
entry.def: A traumatic experience is very shocking and upsetting, and may cause psychological damage.

example.ex: I suffered a nervous breakdown. It was a traumatic experience...
example.tran: 我曾经神经崩溃过。那是一次痛苦的经历。

example.ex: For a child the death of a pet can be traumatic.
example.tran: 对孩子来说，一只宠物的死亡可能会造成心理创伤。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a physical injury or wound to the body
3. causing physical or especially psychological injury;

sentences.sentence: "few experiences are more traumatic than losing a child"

auth_sentence.content: It was a traumatic experience not knowing your fate.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a traumatic experience not knowing your fate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a traumatic experience not knowing your fate.

auth_sentence.content: Who wouldn't? Taking a life is traumatic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Who wouldn't? Taking a life is traumatic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who wouldn't? Taking a life is traumatic.

auth_sentence.content: I don't remember that being traumatic or anything.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't remember that being traumatic or anything.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't remember that being traumatic or anything.

Sentence.sentence: Friends and other veterans of the process have warned Meg that the back and forth between editing parent and writing student can be traumatic (痛苦的).

means.word_mean: (经历)痛苦难忘的,造成精神创伤的

sentences.en: this deeply traumatic incident in his past
sentences.cn: 这件给他留下深深的精神创伤的往事

sentences.en: She has been through a very traumatic experience.
sentences.cn: 她经历了一件很痛苦的事。

sentences.en: The onset of depression often follows a traumatic event.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症发作常常发生在遭受创伤之后。

sentences.en: He is plagued by demons which go back to his traumatic childhood.
sentences.cn: 他为心魔所困扰，那可追溯至他饱受创伤的童年。
